E-commerce Fashion Store built with Next.js

Alma Issues is a sophisticated e-commerce platform specializing in fashion retail, built with Next.js. The application features advanced product management, secure payment processing, and a modern shopping experience optimized for fashion enthusiasts.

Alma Issues showcases the power of Next.js in building high-performance e-commerce applications. By implementing modern web standards, secure payment systems, and intuitive user interfaces, this project demonstrates comprehensive full-stack development capabilities in the fashion retail sector.
Complete online shopping experience with product catalogs, shopping cart, and secure checkout process
Leverages Next.js features like SSR, SSG, and optimized images for superior performance and SEO
Secure payment processing with multiple payment methods and encrypted transaction handling
Specialized design elements and user experience tailored specifically for fashion retail and product presentation

gocha is a sophisticated bookmark management application that helps users organize, categorize, and access their favorite web resources efficiently. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a clean, intuitive interface for bookmark organization and retrieval.

gocha demonstrates the effective implementation of CRUD operations and data validation in web applications. By focusing on user experience and efficient bookmark management, this project showcases the importance of thoughtful design in productivity tools.
Automatically categorizes bookmarks with tags and folders, making it easy to organize and find saved content
Built-in validation system ensures all saved bookmarks are accessible and properly formatted
Powerful search functionality with filtering options to quickly locate specific bookmarks or categories
Seamless import/export functionality for bookmark backup and migration between different browsers

iMentor is a comprehensive mentoring platform built with React that connects mentors and mentees in a structured, goal-oriented environment. The application facilitates meaningful professional relationships through advanced matching algorithms and communication tools.

iMentor exemplifies the power of React in building complex, interactive web applications. By combining modern UI/UX principles with robust state management, this platform successfully bridges the gap between mentors and mentees, creating a valuable resource for professional development and knowledge sharing.
Advanced algorithm that matches mentors and mentees based on skills, goals, experience level, and compatibility factors
Comprehensive dashboard built with React hooks for session management, progress tracking, and goal setting
Integrated messaging system enabling seamless communication between mentors and mentees with notification features
Visual progress indicators and milestone tracking to monitor mentoring relationship development and goal achievement

Illume is a modern corporate website built with cutting-edge web technologies, featuring a modular architecture and responsive design. The project emphasizes clean aesthetics, smooth user experience, and optimized performance for professional business presentation.

Illume represents the successful execution of modern web development principles, combining aesthetic appeal with functional excellence. The project demonstrates proficiency in creating professional corporate websites that effectively communicate brand values while maintaining technical excellence.
Built with a component-based architecture that ensures maintainable, scalable, and reusable code structure
Fully responsive layout optimized for all devices, providing consistent user experience across platforms
Optimized loading times and smooth animations enhance user engagement and site performance
Professional design language that effectively communicates brand identity and corporate values

yapic is a photo-sharing platform built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project showcases advanced templating with Handlebars, providing users with an intuitive interface to share and explore photos in a social environment.

yapic successfully demonstrates the power of Handlebars templating in creating dynamic, user-friendly web applications. By combining server-side templating with responsive design principles, this platform offers users a seamless photo-sharing experience that showcases the potential of traditional web technologies in building modern social platforms.
Users can upload, share, and discover photos in a social media-style interface with intuitive navigation
Leverages Handlebars for dynamic content rendering, ensuring efficient server-side template compilation and management
Fully responsive layout that adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Secure user registration and login system with session management for personalized experiences
The project is built with HTML Canvas, CSS, Javascript. Mr. Stick is a one-player game where the hero tries to survive in a hostile factory. Steal and fire are his enemies.

Mr. Stick deftly combines the versatility of the HTML5 Canvas API with the interactivity of JavaScript to create an immersive 2D gaming experience. Set against the backdrop of a danger-ridden factory, this game not only pushes the boundaries of web-based gaming graphics but also offers an engaging, strategic gameplay that challenges players to think fast and move faster. It stands as a testament to how far browser-based technologies have come in delivering rich, interactive content.
.Step into the shoes of Mr. Stick, navigating a perilous factory. Dodge fiery obstacles and engage in tactical combat with patrolling enemies
Experience the game's rich visual environment, powered by the HTML5 Canvas API, which allows for fluid and detailed 2D graphics rendering
Amass points not only by collecting coins but also by strategically taking down security patrols, adding depth to the gameplay.
Navigate Mr. Stick with a control system that's both intuitive and responsive, ensuring an immersive gameplay experience.
Dual analysis with Power BI & R

A comprehensive dual-platform analysis of Hollywood movie industry data combining Power BI's interactive dashboards with R's statistical analysis capabilities. This project examines box office performance, genre trends, and industry patterns using two complementary analytical approaches.

The Hollywood Movies project successfully demonstrates the power of combining business intelligence tools with statistical programming. By leveraging both Power BI and R, this analysis provides comprehensive insights into the entertainment industry from both business and statistical perspectives.
Interactive dashboards showcasing box office performance, revenue trends, and industry KPIs
Advanced statistical modeling and correlation analysis using R for deeper industry insights
Comprehensive analysis of movie genres, their performance patterns, and market trends
Seamless integration of Power BI visualizations with R statistical outputs for comprehensive analysis

An in-depth analysis of Los Angeles crime data using Tableau for visualization and pattern recognition. This project examines crime trends, geographic hotspots, and temporal patterns to provide insights for public safety and law enforcement strategies.

The L.A. Crime Analysis project effectively demonstrates the application of data visualization in public safety analysis. Through comprehensive Tableau dashboards, this project provides valuable insights into crime patterns that can inform policy decisions and resource allocation.
Comprehensive analysis of crime types, frequency, and temporal patterns across Los Angeles districts
Interactive maps identifying crime hotspots and geographic distribution patterns using Tableau's mapping features
Time-series analysis revealing daily, weekly, and seasonal crime trends for strategic planning
Multiple interconnected dashboards allowing users to filter and explore crime data across different dimensions
Power BI dashboard with business KPIs

A comprehensive business intelligence dashboard built with Power BI that analyzes superstore performance data. This project focuses on key performance indicators, sales trends, and operational metrics to provide actionable business insights for retail management.

The Superstore Analytics dashboard demonstrates proficiency in Power BI for creating comprehensive business intelligence solutions. By focusing on actionable KPIs and intuitive visualizations, this project showcases the ability to transform raw business data into strategic insights.
Comprehensive dashboard tracking sales, profit, quantity, and customer metrics with real-time updates
Detailed analysis of sales trends, seasonal patterns, and product category performance
Advanced customer analysis including geographic distribution, purchase behavior, and loyalty metrics
Dedicated dashboard for tracking and analyzing product returns with root cause analysis

A comprehensive analysis of world demographics combining SQL database queries with Python data visualization. This project explores population trends, age distributions, and demographic patterns across different countries and regions using advanced data analysis techniques.

This world demographics project showcases the synergy between SQL for data extraction and Python for analysis and visualization. By combining these powerful tools, the project delivers comprehensive insights into global demographic trends and patterns.
Complex SQL queries to extract and aggregate demographic data from world population databases
Comprehensive data analysis using pandas, numpy, and statistical libraries for demographic insights
Interactive charts and graphs using matplotlib and seaborn to visualize demographic trends
Analysis of population growth, age distribution, and regional demographic patterns worldwide

An interactive dashboard that analyzes the wealth distribution and economic indicators across different nations. Built using Excel for data preprocessing and Tableau for advanced visualization, this project provides insights into global economic patterns and trends.

The Wealth of Nations dashboard successfully demonstrates the power of combining Excel's data manipulation capabilities with Tableau's visualization features. This project provides valuable insights into global economic patterns and showcases proficiency in business intelligence tools for data analysis and presentation.
Comprehensive dashboard with interactive filters and visualizations for exploring wealth distribution across nations
Advanced Excel techniques for data cleaning, transformation, and preparation for visualization
Analysis of key economic metrics including GDP, population, and wealth per capita across different countries
Visual representation of economic trends and patterns to identify insights in global wealth distribution
